SELECT ic.comment_level commentLevel, ic.content content, ic.created_time createdTime, ic.sepc_name sepcName, users.face userFace, users.nickname nickName FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users users ON ic.user_id = users.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{params.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{params.commentLevel}

SELECT items.id AS itemId, items.item_name AS itemName, items.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, temps.price_discount as price FROM items items LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON items.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) temps ON temps.item_id = items.id where ii.is_main = 1
AND items.item_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.keywords},'%')
ORDER BY
items.sell_counts desc
temps.price_discount asc
items.item_name desc
